sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: REST-HARROW or Cammock, the Ononis Arvensis. A decoction of this plant has been much recommended for horses labouring under a stoppage of urine. It is the pest of some corn-fields ; but in its younger state, before the plant has acquired thorns, it is a most acceptable food for sheep.
